directions.route_direction_description:
Trains will depart Sandringham Station, Hampton Station, Brighton Beach Station, Middle Brighton Station, North Brighton Station, Gardenvale Station, Elsternwick Station, Ripponlea Station, Balaclava Station, Windsor Station, Prahran Station, South Yarra Station, Richmond Station and terminate at Flinders Street Station. On weekends, services travel via the City Loop. 

CITY STATIONS: Flagstaff Station, Melbourne Central Station, Parliament Station, Flinders Street Station and Southern Cross Station (Spencer Street). 

CITY LOOP: Use of the City Loop depends on the day of the week. Most weekday services operate direct to Flinders Street.  Weekend services operate to Flinders Street via the City Loop.  

STOPPING PATTERNS. All trains stop all stations.

Trains will depart Flinders Street Station, Richmond Station, South Yarra Station, Prahran Station, Windsor Station, Balaclava Station, Ripponlea Station, Elsternwick Station, Gardenvale Station, North Brighton Station, Middle Brighton Station, Brighton Beach Station, Hampton Station and Sandringham Station. 

CITY STATIONS: Flagstaff Station, Melbourne Central Station, Parliament Station, Flinders Street Station and Southern Cross Station (Spencer Street). 

CITY LOOP: Use of the City Loop depends on the day of the week. Weekend services will have operated via the City Loop before reaching Flinders Street.  

STOPPING PATTERNS. All trains stop all stations.
